original_text: And the little ones that you said would be taken captive, your children who do not yet know good from bad—they will enter the land. I will give it to them and they will take possession of it.
korean_text: 또 너희가 사로잡히리라 하던 너희의 아이들과 당시에 선악을 분별하지 못하던 너희의 자녀들도 그리로 들어갈 것이라 내가 그 땅을 그들에게 주어 산업이 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: that you said would be taken captive
your children who do not yet know good from bad
sentences.korean_translation: 아직 선악을 분별하지 못하는 네 자녀들

sentences.original_text: I will give it to them
and they will take possession of it
